    • arround

      public static double arround​(double value, int size, int roundmode)
      Arround a double to a number of digit : arround(0.8999999,1)=0.9 arround(8999999.0,1)=9000000.0
      Parameters:
      roundmode - :BigDecimal.ROUND_UP(9.1=>10), BigDecimal.ROUND_DOWN(9.9=>9), BigDecimal.ROUND_HALF_EVEN(9.51=>10; 9.49=>9)
